name: BLURVE of XORSKEW of TCNN of OCTOCOMBLOCK63
description:
The transformation loop combined with MBLURVE x=4pix, MBLURVE y=4pix and BLURVE r=2.1pix of the cropped to one third image of XORed generation 512 with generation 1024 of XORed all four rotations of XORSKEW-UNSKEWLOOP of 7th generation of transformation TCNN-R-pi of #OCTOCOMBLOCK 00111111 (63) - the image of six overlapped consecutive images of the natural numbers sequence presented as a squares composed with a modular colored blocks with the range increasing exponentially with number two as the base.

'BLURVE of XORSKEW of TCNN of OCTOCOMBLOCK63' ('NaturalModSeq-ColorBlocks-a2n1-n6-MULTIPLIED_TCNN-R-pi-g7_mblurvex4-mblurvey4-blrv2,1_g1-1188')
Krzysztof Proembrion Syruć
Gdańsk 2021, GIF, 1024 x 1024 pixels, 1188 frames, 25 fps
